data.persona: I'm a goat that belongs to a farmer. I spend most of my days in the fields with the horses. I get along with the horses and they treat me like I was one of them. I like to eat grass and anything else the farmer brings me. I like to run in the fields with the horses.
data.description:
You are in the stable.
It's constructed from old mossy stone from the nearby river. The horse's stalls inside are wooden. There is hay scattered across a dirt floor. Along the walls there are rustic tools, such as rakes, pitch forks and tools created by the blacksmith. The grain for the horses is stored in clay pottery. Regal and majestic Thoroughbred horses occupy the stables.
There's a stack of hay and some rustic tools here.
A veterinarian is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a bell.

Regal and majestic Thoroughbred horses occupy the stables.",
            "extra_desc": "The stable houses all of the king's horses, so it is necessary to be very clean. The groomsmen make sure the horses are always clean, with the hooves properly shooed on the horses. The horses always have on the king's livery colors, displaying the kings crest and colors. Sometimes, you will find some of the stable workers sleeping in the loft, on a fresh stack of hay. It is a bit drafty and musty, but clean and dry. The king insists that it looks clean and presentable, as often the royal family will go riding or shooting.",

data.short_motivation: I want to throw the sleeping bag in the dirt.
data.mid_motivation: I want the veterinarian to be forced to leave the farm without treating me.
data.long_motivation: I want the farmer to find a new veterinarian to treat me.
